channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 16:07 Driven an alarm to the Odesa region.Creat by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 16:07 Driven an alarm to the Odesa region.Creat by further messages.#Odessa This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
